definition: to herd/to breed livestock/to govern (old)/government official (old)

sentences.english: From then on, the sheep of this shepherd hadn't been thieved by the wolf any more.
sentences.chinese: 从此，那个牧民的羊就再也没有被家狼叼走过了。

sentences.english: The herdsmen like to eat beef , mutton and dairy products, and drink black tea and brick tea .
sentences.chinese: 牧民们喜欢吃牛羊肉和奶制品，喜欢喝红茶和砖茶。

sentences.english: Urban nomads have started appearing only in the past few years.
sentences.chinese: 都市游牧民仅仅是过去几年才出现的一族。

sentences.english: I teach the shepherds that they mustn't throw their wool away.
sentences.chinese: 现在我又回来了，我教牧民们不要把羊毛丢弃掉。

sentences.english: Farmers and poultry producers have lost billions of dollars as a result.
sentences.chinese: 农牧民和家禽饲养商因此蒙受了数十亿美元的损失。
土库曼人向来是游牧民族。

sentences.english: The young herdsman briskly mounted a horse that was inclined to act up with an unaccustomed rider.
sentences.chinese: 年轻牧民轻快地跃上一匹惯于对生人使性子的马。

sentences.english: Farmers and herders came into conflict over land and water.
sentences.chinese: 农民和牧民为争夺土地和水资源而发生冲突。

sentences.english: And so the herders moved ineluctably towards disaster.
sentences.chinese: 如此一来，牧民们不可避免地走向灾难。

sentences.english: Provide information service to the local farmers & herdsmen. Improve their information literacy.
sentences.chinese: 为当地农牧民提供信息服务，提升他们的信息素养。

sentences.english: Inspection Unit Wherever he went, by peasants and herdsmen sincere welcome.
sentences.chinese: 检查组每到一处，受到农牧民的真诚欢迎。

sentences.english: On horseback, we travel around to bring joy to our herders.
sentences.chinese: 我们骑在马背上，走四方，给牧民带来快乐。

sentences.english: Pastoralists suffering, you can plateau in India under the footprint of this piece?
sentences.chinese: 苦难的牧民，你可曾在这片高原印下足迹？

sentences.english: His new film is an epic of the nomads.
sentences.chinese: 他新拍的这部电影是游牧民族的一部史诗。

sentences.english: Then, the Song court was forced to move to Hangzhou as its imperial court because it could not push back the nomadic invaders.
sentences.chinese: 那时南宋朝廷不敌游牧民族的进攻，被迫转移到杭州。

sentences.english: Farmers may want to put up electric fences to inclose enclose grazing areas, called productspaddocks.
sentences.chinese: 牧民可能想要电篱笆以围住放牧区，这叫围场。

definition: nomadic/to move about in search of pasture/to rove around as a nomad
